body_html:
This appears to be a Bazel issue. For tensorflow 1.4.1, I downgraded to Bazel 0.6.1 (not 0.9.0) and that fixed the malloc pointer being freed was not allocated error.
My specs are:

  • macOS Sierra,
  • Tensorflow r1.4
  • Bazel 0.6.1
  • No GPU/Cuda

body:
This appears to be a Bazel issue. For tensorflow 1.4.1, I downgraded to Bazel 0.6.1 (not 0.9.0) and that fixed the `malloc pointer being freed was not allocated` error. 
My specs are:
- macOS Sierra,
- Tensorflow r1.4
- Bazel 0.6.1
- No GPU/Cuda
